entry.title: Sunday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers at times heavy beginning this evening and ending overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
